meanings.definition: A person who engages in excessive or uncontrolled consumption of food or drink.
meanings.sent1: After the party, the binger ate all the leftover cake and cookies.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the family binger, always finishing the snacks in one sitting.
meanings.sent3: The binger couldn't resist the temptation of the dessert table at the buffet.
meanings.sent4: His appetite was like a hungry binger, devouring everything in sight.
meanings.sent5: The image of the binger surrounded by empty plates was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A person who watches multiple episodes of a television show in rapid succession.
meanings.sent1: As a binger, she finished the entire series in one weekend.
meanings.sent2: He is a dedicated binger, always staying up late to watch his favorite shows.
meanings.sent3: The binger laughed at the cliffhanger endings of each episode.
meanings.sent4: Her binge-watching habit turned her into a couch potato binger.
meanings.sent5: The binger's eyes were glued to the screen, captivated by the drama.
